title: Casting to a smart tv
content:
Hi, casting to a smart TV (Samsung in my case) is not always straightforward. Shouldn't there be a foolproof easy way to do that? In recent Sci-Fi movies or series one sees people just swiping up on the screen of their phones to send the phone's screen to a connected TV. Maybe there is a way I don't know about or an app that can do this, it sure would make things easier. 
My phone is a Pixel 3a and the latest Android
